description:
SINGLE CONSULTATION - Please quote ref: P2024/3580/MJR in all correspondence.
This consultation relates to 19 Prior Approval notifications, made under Class AB of Part 20 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended). The applicant proposes a series of two-storey extensions to the existing buildings at Angel Gate to provide 46 new dwellings. 
Details of the sitewide proposals can be found under reference P2024/3580/MJR. 
Specific details of each application can be found under the following references:
-	Units 1+2 Angel Gate, P2024/3152/PRA 
-	Units 3+4 Angel Gate, P2024/3150/PRA
-	Units 5+6 Angel Gate, P2024/3153/PRA
-	Unit 7 Angel Gate, P2024/3151/PRA
-	Units 8, 9+10 Angel Gate, P2024/3156/PRA
-	Unit 11 Angel Gate, P2024/3165/PRA
-	Unit 12 Angel Gate, P2024/3168/PRA
-	Unit 15 Angel Gate, P2024/3222/PRA
-	Unit 16 Angel Gate, P2024/3263/PRA
-	Units 17+18 Angel Gate, P2024/3264/PRA
-	Unit 19 Angel Gate, P2024/3411/PRA
-	Units 20+21 Angel Gate, P2024/3412/PRA
-	Units 22+23 Angel Gate, P2024/3413/PRA
-	Unit 24 Angel Gate, P2024/3415/PRA
-	Unit 25 Angel Gate, P2024/3417/PRA
-	Units 27+28 Angel Gate, P2024/3418/PRA
-	Unit 29 Angel Gate, P2024/3419/PRA
-	Unit 30 Angel Gate, P2024/3420/PRA
-	Unit 31 Angel Gate, P2024/3422/PRA
